Description.Name: Tech Points
Description.Details: Tech Points are generated each day and spent to repair or customize BattleMechs. Tech Points only apply to one 'Mech task at a time, so additional tasks are queued to be worked on next.

temporalSetResult: [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_MechTechSkill], Tech Points]] are set to {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalPositiveResult: The company gains a +{RES_VALUE.ToString} [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_MechTechSkill], Tech Point]] boost for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalNegativeResult: The company suffers a -{RES_VALUE.ToString} [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_MechTechSkill], Tech Point]] penalty for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalPositiveResultEnd: The +{RES_VALUE.ToString} [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_MechTechSkill], Tech Point]] boost has expired
temporalNegativeResultEnd: The -{RES_VALUE.ToString} [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_MechTechSkill], Tech Point]] penalty has expired
